languages.text: "Допустим, Кьява впала в ересь. И что? Опять предложишь взорвать целую планету?"

traits.locale_text: "Допустим, Кьява впала в ересь. И что? Опять предложишь взорвать целую планету?"

languages.text: "Let us assume Kiava Gamma has fallen to heresy. What then? Will you again propose we destroy an entire planet?"
languages.original_text: "Допустим, Кьява впала в ересь. И что? Опять предложишь взорвать целую планету?"

traits.locale_text: "Let us assume Kiava has fallen to heresy. What then? Will you again propose we destroy an entire planet?"
"Let us assume Kiava has fallen to heresy. What then? Will you again propose we destroy an entire planet?"
"Let us assume Kiava Gamma has fallen to heresy. What then? Will you again propose we destroy an entire planet?"
"Let us assume Kiava Gamma has fallen to heresy. What then? Will you again propose we destroy an entire planet?"
"Let us assume Kiava Gamma has fallen to heresy. What then? Will you again propose we destroy an entire planet?"

languages.text: «Supongamos que Kiava Gamma se ha sumido en la herejía. ¿Qué hará? ¿Volverá a proponer la destrucción de un planeta entero?».
languages.original_text: "Let us assume Kiava Gamma has fallen to heresy. What then? Will you again propose we destroy an entire planet?"

traits.locale_text: «Supongamos que Kiava Gamma se ha sumido en la herejía. ¿Qué hará? ¿Volverá a proponer la destrucción de un planeta entero?».

languages.text: “咱们假设基亚瓦伽马星已经落入了异端的魔掌，那你打算怎么做？你要再次提议直接把整个行星摧毁吗？”
languages.original_text: "Let us assume Kiava Gamma has fallen to heresy. What then? Will you again propose we destroy an entire planet?"

traits.locale_text: “咱们假设基亚瓦伽马星已经落入了异端的魔掌，那你打算怎么做？你要再次提议直接把整个行星摧毁吗？”

languages.text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマが異端の手に堕ちたと仮定しよう。そうなったならどうする？また惑星を丸々破壊しろと言うのか？」
languages.original_text: "Let us assume Kiava Gamma has fallen to heresy. What then? Will you again propose we destroy an entire planet?"

traits.locale_text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマが異端の手に堕ちたと仮定しよう。そうなったならどうする？また惑星を丸々破壊しろと言うのか？」

languages.text: "Nehmen wir an, Kiava Gamma ist der Ketzerei verfallen. Was dann? Schlagt Ihr dann erneut vor, einen ganzen Planeten zu zerstören?"
languages.original_text: "Let us assume Kiava Gamma has fallen to heresy. What then? Will you again propose we destroy an entire planet?"

traits.locale_text: "Nehmen wir an, Kiava Gamma ist der Ketzerei verfallen. Was dann? Schlagt Ihr dann erneut vor, einen ganzen Planeten zu zerstören?"

languages.text: « Admettons que Kiava Gamma a succombé à l'hérésie. Que feriez-vous, dans ce cas ? Proposeriez-vous à nouveau de détruire une planète entière ? »
languages.original_text: "Let us assume Kiava Gamma has fallen to heresy. What then? Will you again propose we destroy an entire planet?"

traits.locale_text: « Admettons que Kiava Gamma a succombé à l'hérésie. Que feriez-vous, dans ce cas ? Proposeriez-vous à nouveau de détruire une planète entière ? »

languages.text: "Kiava Gama'nın kâfirliğe yenik düştüğünü varsayalım. Planın nedir? Yine komple bir gezegeni yok etmemizi mi önereceksin?"
languages.original_text: "Let us assume Kiava Gamma has fallen to heresy. What then? Will you again propose we destroy an entire planet?"

traits.locale_text: "Kiava Gama'nın kâfirliğe yenik düştüğünü varsayalım. Planın nedir? Yine komple bir gezegeni yok etmemizi mi önereceksin?"
